metadata.name: HTML
metadata.author: RenderX Team
metadata.description: Rich HTML component for sanitized pasted markup blocks.

styles.css: .rx-html { display: block; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.4; color: #222; word-wrap: break-word; overflow-wrap: anywhere; } .rx-html h1, .rx-html h2, .rx-html h3, .rx-html h4, .rx-html h5, .rx-html h6 { font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.25; margin: 0.6em 0 0.4em; } .rx-html p { margin: 0 0 0.75em; } .rx-html ul, .rx-html ol { padding-left: 1.4em; margin: 0 0 0.75em; } .rx-html code, .rx-html pre { font-family: ui-monospace, SFMono-Regular, Menlo, Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', monospace; font-size: 0.9em; background: #f5f5f5; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; } .rx-html pre { padding: 8px 10px; overflow: auto; } .rx-html a { color: #0d62ff; text-decoration: underline; } .rx-html blockquote { margin: 0 0 0.75em; padding: 0.5em 0.75em; border-left: 4px solid #ccc; background: #fafafa; }

library.css: .rx-lib .rx-html { background: linear-gradient(135deg,#6366f1,#4f46e5); color: #fff; padding: 10px 12px; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); } .rx-lib .rx-html a { color: #fff; }

ui.placeholder: Paste HTML (supports headings, tables, forms, SVG, etc.)
